titleStmt.title: By the Lord Deputy and Council. Tyrconnell. Whereas we have formerly thought fit to issue our proclamation bearing the date the 11th day of April 1687, and therein pursuant to the power given us the Lord Deputy and Council ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Deputy (1687-1689 : Tyrconnel)
Tyrconnel, Richard Talbot, Earl of, 1630-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook and Samuel Helsham assigns of Benjamin Tooke printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty; and are to be sold at the Kings printinghouse on Ormonde-Key, and the Colledge-Arms in Castle-street.,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
"Given at the Council-chamber in Dublin the 28th day of December. 1688.".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
